name: validate_card_number
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool credit_card_number_validator.
Tool description: Enter the first few all numbers of a Credit Card to determine if it is valid and its details. By simply providing the first few numbers or a complete credit card number, this API will validate what card type it is and if it is likely valid using algorithms.
API description: Validate a credit card number and get the card type by using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

cardnumber.description: The credit card number to be validated.
